body_html: To make the symbol available in the image_ops namespace, I think you'll have to add the @@total_variation callout to image_ops.py: https://github.com/Hvass-Labs/tensorflow/blob/02da06577be86ed095cde20fc674e7604e99894d/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops.py#L164

body: To make the symbol available in the image_ops namespace, I think you'll have to add the @@total_variation  callout to image_ops.py: https://github.com/Hvass-Labs/tensorflow/blob/02da06577be86ed095cde20fc674e7604e99894d/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops.py#L164
